description: I am a Software Engineer specialized in writing type-safe TypeScript code with a passion for training other engineers.
help_message: Stuck in a bug for days? Unsure about the best approach to implement a feature? I am here to help!
boxes: Respond to your questions and solve bugs in minutes instead of days.
Advance your career and skills without struggling by yourself for months.
Code reviews to advise you on best practices and alternative implementations.
Implement, explain, and document features to help you progress faster.
